1.content: Will snooki be a giantess or will you be tiny before her?
1.title: The start

choices: She wants to find some people to play with
11.content:
Snooki walked down the streets of Seaside Heights, looking for something to do. She spotted a flyer in a window for a new, super-fast tanning bed, and just couldn't resist.

"Hey, I'd like to try the new bed!" Snooki said, walking into the building.

"Well, sure, but nobody's ever used it yet," The desk attendant responded, leading her to the room. Inside the room, there was a large machine connected to the tanning bed. "It uses nuclear power or something like that," she mentioned, motioning for Snooki to lay on the bed. She removed her clothes and lay down, and the attendant closed the bed and turned it on. The machine whirred strangely as the lights turned on, and the sound grew louder with the lights getting brighter.

"Um, hello?" Snooki called, banging on the door, "I think something's wrong!" Suddenly, there was a flash and a loud bang. The door slowly opened, and the machine appeared unscathed. Snooki redressed and went out to the desk again.

"I think the machine broke," She said.

"No, it's supposed to do that, just look at yourself!" The girl exclaimed, pointing at a mirror.

Snooki was speechless when she saw her flawless tan. What would usually take multiple sessions to achieve was done in a matter of minutes! However; she noticed that her clothes seemed to fit tighter than before, and as she walked out, she hit her head on a hanging plant.

While she was walking back home, Snooki decided to stop at Taco Bell. She seemed even taller when she walked into the restaurant, finding it harder to sit down in her tight clothes.

After her meal, she went to the bathroom and nearly hit her head on the doorway, though she didn't notice. But as she was washing her hands, the sink mysteriously sunk.. No.. She grew!

"What's happening to me?!?" She exclaimed as her clothes started ripping. As she progressed, Snooki was growing faster! Within a minute she had reached the ceiling, showing no signs of stopping, and her clothes were shredded. Eventually, she outgrew the bathroom, breaking through the ceiling. When she was done, Snooki had grown to 80 feet tall.

What happens next?
11.title: Giantess storyline

12.content: Will you be shrunk by snooki herself? Or accidental?
12.title: Shrinking storyline

choices: Puts you back in her shoe to play
121.content: You see a girl looking at you, she's really tan and her hair is in a poof, not your thing, but she's really cute. She comes over and asks you if you want go get a tan with her, you say sure. You go to a tanning place you never noticed before, you walk in she tells you to get naked so you do. You lay down in the bed, and you here a click, you start to think shouldn't the light becoming on by now the next thing you know metal bars shackle your arms and legs to the tanning bed. You scream to let you out the light comes on, and you feel weird. You here evil spine chilling laughter, and then you realize who this girl is it's snooki, but why would she do this you wonder. You then hear her say oh I can't wait to play with my new little toy. You think, I'm not little. You pass out, next thing you know you feel is a soft fabric and you can barely move. The fabric looks black with white stripes, and the floor you're on feels firm but soft. The fabric starts to wiggle, then you realize where you are in a shoe but how. You start to wiggle, and snooki feels you. She then takes her foot out of the shoe on the way out her socked toes grab you. She lifts you up and pokes you a bit. She then laughs and...
121.title: A tan gone bad

Then she grabbed you with her socked toes again and took off her other shoe and placed you between her two socked feet then pressed them together squeezing you, all the while laughing and taking pictures and videos of you. She then put you under her toes where you were trapped in her socks, she then took out the socks from the shoe and put it on this
foot trapping you between two socks, then put her shoe back on time to go to...
1211.title: Puts you back in her shoe to play

info.description: No rules. Just keep snooki in charge of everything.
